subject: Dreamweaver
body:
He was one of those men who possess almost every gift, except the gift of the power to use them.

He is useless on top of the ground he ought to be under it, inspiring the cabbages.

All things must change to something new, to something strange.

Force without forecast is to little avail.

Money is a poor man's credit card.

The family is one of nature's masterpieces.

It takes a kind of shabby arrogance to survive in our time, and a fairly romantic nature to want to.

It is the Vague and Elusive. Meet it and you will not see its head. Follow it and you will not see its back.

His Labor is a Chant -- his Idleness -- a Tune -- oh, for a Bee's experience of Clovers, and of Noon!

Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.

Most people enjoy the inferiority of their best friends.

I look to a day when people will not be judged by the color of their skin, but by the content of their character.

For everyone of us that succeeds, it's because there's somebody there to show you the way out.
